name: Race
victoryScreenHeader:
Complete all the terraformer parts
to win!
victoryString: Victory has been achieved by population! 50% of the world's population now belongs to your country, and now the official language of the world is your country's language, and the culture and discoveries that represent humanity belong to your country is quoted.
